channel.title: Acrylicx ||eco|| webclient || active community||staff needed
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://acrylicx.com/new-img/logo.png[/img]
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img]Webclient:[url=http://acrylicx.com/play]Click Here[/url] |[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/jfx7v4.png[/img] [url=http://acrylicx.com/play/client.jar]Client.jar[/url]| Website:[url=http://acrylicx.com]Acrylicx[/url]
ArcTeK Staff Team ArcTeK is a staff team in which manage the community and develop the game. We have the dedication of both adding content to the game to entertain our lovely players and make the community so memorable. We have managed to get Acrylicx to page 2 on every single toplist we had available to vote, and ArcTek wishes you can help Acrylicx become the #1 private server.
ArcTeK Staff Team Matt-Founder/Developer Kyle-Head admin and Community Manager Compulsion-Lead Developer Flash-Web Developer Ryan-Graphic and Web Developer
[b]Server Features 3 Different GameFrames Working Curses Decent Summoning Fixed Bugs Dedicated Staff Team Friendly Community Low Memory Usage Fast Loading Client 602 Animations Vote4Rewards System Flawless Playerkilling Dicing Fixed Known Bugs Virtual Private Server(CentOS 5)
[url=http://acrylicx.com/forum/index.php?topic=112.0]For those whom are looking forward to getting a PMOD or FMOD position[/url]
[b][u]The Beginning of a Growing Community[/b] Sunday's Bandos Event! [img]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/5307/bandosc.png[/img] Monday's Armadyl Event! [img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/3655/gwd2.png[/img]
ArcTeK will see this server grow.. We will cherish every moment of it also. [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2dt3w1x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2mivyx.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/7233/dca24f48feac47dcbf387b6.png[/img] I don't have a promo video, since our designer has been inactive because of school, but we will be taking some videos from members. ;) Cmon' and check us out! We love our players!
The Conduit = Acrylicx http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qcoE9dOj3Fc Compulsion use to own and program IllusionX and Toomuchpk. So the closest thing I can get! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1TuvSUYS-Wk[/CENTER]

@Compulsion wrote:

[CENTER]

Webclient:Click Here | Client.jar| Website:Acrylicx

ArcTeK Staff Team
ArcTeK is a staff team in which manage the community and develop the game. We have the dedication of both adding content to the game to entertain our lovely players and make the community so memorable. We have managed to get Acrylicx to page 2 on every single toplist we had available to vote, and ArcTek wishes you can help Acrylicx become the #1 private server.

ArcTeK Staff Team
Matt-Founder/Developer
Kyle-Head admin and Community Manager
Compulsion-Lead Developer
Flash-Web Developer
Ryan-Graphic and Web Developer

[b]Server Features
3 Different GameFrames
Working Curses
Decent Summoning
Fixed Bugs
Dedicated Staff Team
Friendly Community
Low Memory Usage
Fast Loading Client
602 Animations
Vote4Rewards System
Flawless Playerkilling
Dicing
Fixed Known Bugs
Virtual Private Server(CentOS 5)

For those whom are looking forward to getting a PMOD or FMOD position

[u]The Beginning of a Growing Community
Sunday’s Bandos Event!

Monday’s Armadyl Event!

ArcTeK will see this server grow… We will cherish every moment of it also.

2dt3w1x.png765×509

2mivyx.png767×506


I don’t have a promo video, since our designer has been inactive because of school, but we will be taking some videos from members. Cmon’ and check us out! We love our players!

The Conduit = Acrylicx
